name: Clamour
description:
Clamour is a one of a kind Board game. It's a Deadly game of Strategy, Luck, Tactics, War & Possibility.

Say no to the sound of the dice, we Clamour with shells. Instead of using a traditional dice we use shells to determine player's movement.

The Aim of the game is to complete the crossover from 1 end to another.
Unlike other board games where you play with pawns you play Clamour with gangsters. Just tap & Move your gangsters.Game can be played with 1 player or also 8 real players at the same time.  You have the option of playing the game against the computer, against your friends, or even against people from around the world. Play the way you like it.

Do you think you have what it takes? Can your Clan be the best in this gangster world?

Try to beat your opponents and compete for the highest scores on the leader-boards.

Come Clamour with us!

FEATURES
★Real time Multiplayer
★Clan System
★Multiple Game Boards
☆GANG WARS
☆FATAL 4 WAY
★MULTIPLE GAME TYPES
☆PLAYER VS PLAYER
☆PLAYER VS AI
☆CLAN VS CLAN
☆TAG TEAM
★Chat system
★Levelling Up
★In game Achievements & Leaderboards
★Daily Login Rewards
